name: Blocky: The Epic Shooter Remastered
description:
Join blocky in his remastered story! Story:

After the escape of that 5 star run you and your friends committed, zombies are after you! Kill them all off to proceed to the next stage! Make sure to get em' all!

Remastered. Remastered for modern day devices. With shading, New text for the HUD, 45 FRAMES, And more!
